pages.text: Shei zuo yi jian shangong, shei jiang huode bi na shangong geng hao de shan bao [zhu]. Zai na ri, tamen jiang mian shou kongbu.
Shei gan yi jian e xing, tamen jiang fuwozhe bei reng ru huo yu li.[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen zhi shou nimen suo fanzui e de huan bao.”

[Ni shuo]:“Wo [mu sheng] zhi fengming chongbai zhe zuo chengshi [mai jia] de zhu [an la], ta yi ba gai cheng ding wei jindi [zhu][huo shengjie zhi di]. Wanshi dou gui ta zhangguan. Wo yi fengming zuo guishun zhe [musilin],
bing [fengming xiang renlei] xuandu “gulanjing”.” Shei zunxing zhengdao, shei zi shou qi yi; shei mi wu,[shei zi shou qi hai]. Ni [yingdui zhe zhong ren] shuo:“Wo zhishi yige jinggao zhe.”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la. Ta jiang zhaoshi nimen ta de jixiang, nimen jiang renshi zhexie jixiang. Ni de zhu jue bu hushi nimen suo zuo de.”
Ta, xi, mi mu [alabo yu san ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi].
Zhexie shi mingbai [chanming wanshi wanwu] de jingdian [“gulanjing”] de jing wen.
Weile xinyang de minzhong, wo yi zhenli [rushi] xiang ni [mu sheng] xushu mu sa he falao de gushi.

Falao dique ceng zai guonei aoman wudu. Ta ba guomin fencheng xuduo paibie [dengji], yapo qizhong yipai [ru yiselie de houyi], shahai tamen de nanhai, er rang tamen de nuhai huozhe. Ta que shi zuo'eduoduan di.
Wo yao ba enhui shi yu zai da dishang shou qiya zhe, wo yao shi tamen chengwei tongzhi zhe he jicheng zhe.
